product_desc:
Orange Silicon Valley is the Bay Area division of Orange one of the world's leading telecommunications operators, serving 236 million customers. The people of Orange Silicon Valley actively participate in the disruptive innovations that are changing the way we communicate, which is the core business of Orange in the 220 countries where Orange does business. We contribute to and engage with the Silicon Valley ecosystem in a variety of ways. 

At Orange Silicon Valley, we thrive on collaboration, seek out disruption, and anticipate that the future is closer than we think. We act as guides to the digital revolution occurring in Silicon Valley, and regularly receive business and corporate decision-makers from all parts of the world. 

The services and activities executed by the Orange Silicon Valley team are constantly evolving. What remains constant in all our iterations is our commitment to be objective, insightful, and inclusive of the ecosystem in everything we design and do.
high_concept: Orange Silicon Valley is a division of Orange one of the world's top telecom operators
name: Orange Silicon Valley
